extendedInfo.description: ***Read This for Important Information!***Motivation, motivation, motivation! That's what 'Motivate Me' is all about.I originally created this app out of necessity for myself. I've always been subject to laziness and impulse eating so one day I decided to write a little app that I could open and use when I feel like skipping my workout or eating something I really, really shouldn't.And I hope it can help you like it has helped me.What this app can't do... - This app isn't magic, it can't create desire inside you to get in shape or lose weight. It can't kick you in the butt and make you go to the gym. It can't throw away your junk food or make you dislike the flavor of fat and sugar. - This app won't amaze you with fancy graphics or animations, it's simple with minimal fluff, simple and straight to the point.What this app can do... - It can help you get past the impulse to eat a doughnut at work or to make a quick stop at McDonald's for a burger. - It can give you that little extra push you need to hit the weights or put on your running shoes.Again, it's not magic but it has certainly helped me burn some extra calories and keep from eating some extra calories.It's motivation, plain and simple.A quick tip on using this app:Let it help you, don't fight it, let it help you talk yourself into doing what you really want. Let it push you to be better.Future plans for this app:There are a lot of additions I would like to make but I'm not a professional programmer so I need to know if you want them. Here are a few planned additions: - A history that can be graphed of all the bad calories you haven't eaten from using this app. - A history of calories burned or workouts completed from the help of this app. - Many more motivational phrases and images (size permitting). - Workout ideas when your normal exercises just aren't motivating you. - Anything else I can think of that would be helpful!So please, if you find this app useful, rate it and add in the comments what you would like to see in future releases to help you stay on the path to fitness, health and happiness!Thank you very much and I hope you have a wonderful day!Best Regards,Eric Schmidt

reviews.title: Works for me....
reviews.comment: But after a time, all the quotes and pictures gets old. Provide us an update please...!!!!
reviews.author: Gaurav Gautam

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I like how u get to choose yes or no to start losing weight even after u read the quote. Quite fun, i would say. BUT this is the first day...but hey nice first impression XDD
reviews.author: Julie Lam

reviews.title: Really helpful
reviews.comment: I really like this app and the simplicity of it. Especially the \'yes\' \'no\' questions on the motivational section - really makes you think about what you\'re doing. For the future more motivational images would be nice, and maybe an option for male or female pictures (i have no idea if that\'s possible.) Recording how this app has helped you would be good. Or maybe just a little congratulations/well done after you\'ve resisted a temptation/done some exercise.
reviews.author: Sinead Longden

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: This app really works for me because of its simple design & lack of unnecessary distracting features. I use it not only for exercise but also for studying & work to keep my attention focused. Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Faisal A.K.

reviews.title: Personalisation options and a counter would be great
reviews.comment: This would be even better if you could key in your own personal motivation reminders to flash up as well as preinstalled ones and also your own images. Also a page of counts would be great too. Sort of like AS it\'s been x days since my last drink; this could be a screen of positive or negative and you key in the parameters. Eg. 5 days of sticking to calories. 6 days since no takeout. 5 trips to gym when didn\'t feel like it.
reviews.author: b bumper

reviews.title: Vrry good but...
reviews.comment: Could be the best if you could input male or female and then get relevant pictures.
reviews.author: Paula Meldrum

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Easy to use, keeps me from binging on the naughty stuff
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What apps should be.
reviews.comment: This is exactly what apps should be, some and helpful, without a lot of fluff.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good idea but crashes!
reviews.comment: This is a great idea for an app exactly what I was looking for. But the only part of app that works is the images. When I click on either one for \"help\" it turns my screen black, freezes the phone and crashes the app. :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun little app
reviews.comment: Love it! It\'s a simple great fun little app for any age. Don\'t mind the motivational pictures for men either ;-) certainly made me forget that chocolate biscuit.
reviews.author: Amanda Roe

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: I am someone who has low matabolism and energy. And i like this app for giving me the right amount of modivation i need.  Thank you so much
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s ok
reviews.comment: Pretty well made app, I was looking for  something with more personal accountability though
reviews.author: Lisa Abbott

reviews.title: fun
reviews.comment: lot of personality in this app, probably more motivating than those overly complex exercise tracking apps with the personality of a dental office floor tile
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I love this app. Have just downloaded it but can already tell i will be using it often. I love the links to other websites! Very helpful, simple and easy to use!! Thank you :), someone really did get it right!
reviews.author: Ruth Trathen

reviews.title: I wanted to like it...
reviews.comment: But it did nothing but crash. Awesome idea, horrible app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I like this app.
reviews.comment: Mabey there could be a blank box where you can add your own quotes?
reviews.author: pat n

reviews.comment: Sweet idea but not such sweet app
reviews.author: A Google User
